mapper.select: SELECT B.MEMBER_ID, B.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.count, B.rank FROM ( SELECT A.MEMBER_ID, A.MEMBER_NICKNAME, A.count, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY count DESC) AS rank FROM( SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, COUNT(*) AS count FROM FOLLOWER GROUP BY MEMBER_ID,MEMBER_NICKNAME )A )B WHERE B.rank < 6

SELECT B.MEMBER_ID, B.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.count as allCount, B.rank FROM ( SELECT A.MEMBER_ID, A.MEMBER_NICKNAME, A.count, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY count DESC) AS rank FROM( SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, COUNT(*) AS count FROM SUPPORT_BOARD GROUP BY MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME )A )B WHERE B.rank < 6
